channel.title: To prevent deleting your Journal
channel.description:
I was watching this streamer "KyleStreamsStuff", and this happened, so he got an idea for some suggestions.. https://clips.twitch.tv/FancyHedonisticDumplingsDoubleRainbow
**First suggestion would be** - when you click "Journal" it would open it and if you click it once more it would close it instead of opening it "again"
**Second suggestion would be** - Like in that clip what you saw, he tried to CTRL+C but instead did CTRL+V so he deleted his logs and got executed (RIP) - So to prevent stuff like this happening, would be great to have a **button on each side of journal "Copy page"**
These ideas was made by KyleStreamsStuff, not by me, I'm just here to share them with you.

item.title: To prevent deleting your Journal
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
I was unaware you couldn’t undo things. Never thought about testing it. I’ll add it in next patch.

Read full topic

item.title: To prevent deleting your Journal
item.dc:creator: JanoRis
item.description:
I agree. I think it is known that the Journal could need some Quality of Life feature updates.

This whole clip just perfectly shows in a hilarious way what is wrong with the current Journal.

Read full topic

item.title: To prevent deleting your Journal
item.dc:creator: thceraw
item.description:
I was watching this streamer “KyleStreamsStuff”, and this happened, so he got an idea for some suggestions…
https://clips.twitch.tv/FancyHedonisticDumplingsDoubleRainbow

First suggestion would be - when you click “Journal” it would open it and if you click it once more it would close it instead of opening it “again”

Second suggestion would be - Like in that clip what you saw, he tried to CTRL+C but instead did CTRL+V so he deleted his logs and got executed (RIP) - So to prevent stuff like this happening, would be great to have a button on each side of journal "Copy page"

These ideas was made by KyleStreamsStuff, not by me, I’m just here to share them with you.
